property.name: current encoder
property.description: the currently selected encoder (MP3, AIFF, WAV, etc.)

property.name: current EQ preset
property.description: the currently selected equalizer preset

property.name: current playlist
property.description: the playlist containing the currently targeted track

property.name: current stream title
property.description: the name of the current song in the playing stream (provided by streaming server)

property.name: current stream URL
property.description: the URL of the playing stream or streaming web site (provided by streaming server)

property.name: current track
property.description: the current targeted track

property.name: current visual
property.description: the currently selected visual plug-in

property.name: EQ enabled
property.description: is the equalizer enabled?

property.name: fixed indexing
property.description: true if all AppleScript track indices should be independent of the play order of the owning playlist.

property.name: frontmost
property.description: is iTunes the frontmost application?

property.name: full screen
property.description: are visuals displayed using the entire screen?

property.name: name
property.description: the name of the application

property.name: mute
property.description: has the sound output been muted?

property.name: player position
property.description: the playerâ€™s position within the currently playing track in seconds.

property.name: player state
property.description: is iTunes stopped, paused, or playing?

property.name: selection
property.description: the selection visible to the user

property.name: sound volume
property.description: the sound output volume (0 = minimum, 100 = maximum)

property.name: version
property.description: the version of iTunes

property.name: visuals enabled
property.description: are visuals currently being displayed?

property.name: visual size
property.description: the size of the displayed visual
